help-file.title: CONCEALMENT
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> | <object> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
Concealment grants the target a limited form of invisibility, but it can be broken by almost any action on the recipient's part. Concealment can be detected with "Detect Invisibility", and can be dispelled by "Reveal True Form" and "Faerie Fog".
